name: Global Domination — Tommy Eyesight to the Blind™
description: It's your damn browser. If you set the font size, no web "designer" should muck with it. Global Domination — Tommy Eyesight to the Blind™ lets you assert your authority! For those pesky sites that need specific fixes, add the companion style Global Domination — We're Not Gonna Take It™ Modded from Font Size Enforcer and its derivative, Global Font Size
additional_info: November 28, 2013 OK. So, as of today, Tommy Eyesight to the Blind™ now gives you the easiest-to-read font available free. You shall feel like you're speed-reading the Internet. The key to the font is the curvature of the letters. Each letter pushes you into the next while pulling you along from the letter before. Once you adopt this style, never shall you want to go back to the way it was before. Much thanks to the font's creator, Eduardo Rodríguez Tunni who works as a typographer and graphic designer. The style's nakesake is the rock opera Tommy by The Who Tired of frying your eyes? Stop staring into a back-lit medium like its white-bright light bulb. Click here to get Global Domination — Wipe Out!™ and the companion style Global Domination — Boot to the Throat™ and put the boots to web "designers" everywhere.
